EmailTemplate.description: Sent when file batch is processed - Batch creator
EmailTemplate.name: File Batch Processed BC
EmailTemplate.subject: Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!FileBatch__c.FirstApprover__c},
This email is to notify you that Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} for {!FileBatch__c.RecordType} pathway has been processed. Please review and approve the proposed awards.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the Utah Grants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com, if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
utahgrants.support@reisystems.com
Ph. No. 703.480.9100
